sentences.en: A quasilinear equation is one in which the highest - order derivative appears linearly.
sentences.cn: 最高阶导数线性地出现的那种方程是准线性方程.

sentences.en: Another system may be found which is also consistent with the equation.
sentences.cn: 也许会发现与这个方程一致的另一系统.

sentences.en: Equation 13.3 - 9 is of the Van der Pol form.
He believes that this equation connot be applied to heterogeneous flow.
sentences.cn: 他认为该式不能应用到非均质流型.

sentences.en: I can't make this equation come out.
In the equation 2x + 1 = 7, what is x?
sentences.cn: 在方程式2x+1=7中，x的值为多少？

sentences.en: It is conventional to place the independent variable on the right-hand side of an equation.
sentences.cn: 普遍做法是把自变量放在等式的右边。

sentences.en: It is easy to see the conclusions described in the text follow from this equation.
sentences.cn: 很容易可以看出文中所述的结论是由这个方程式推出的。

sentences.en: It was like a single equation with two unknowns.
sentences.cn: 这挺像两个未知数组成了个简单方程.

sentences.en: Predictors have been constructed by modifying the Crank - Nicolson equation.
sentences.cn: 预测式是利用修改克兰克-尼科尔森方程为构成的.

sentences.en: The availability of public transport is also part of the equation.
sentences.cn: 公共交通的便利也是考虑因素之一.

sentences.en: The equation is simple: research breeds new products.
sentences.cn: 情况很简单：研究产生新产品。

sentences.en: The equation of wealth with happiness can be dangerous.
sentences.cn: 把财富与幸福等同起来可能是危险的。

sentences.en: The party fears the equation between higher spending and higher taxes.
sentences.cn: 该党害怕增加开支和增高税收之间的相互制衡。

sentences.en: There is an equation between unemployment and rising crime levels.
sentences.cn: 失业人数增加则犯罪数量增加.

sentences.en: This equation is known as the ideal gas law.
sentences.cn: 这个等式被叫做理想气体定律.

sentences.en: We can express that equation like that.
sentences.cn: 我们可以这样表示那个等式。

sentences.en: When children enter the equation , further tensions may arise within a marriage.
sentences.cn: 有了孩子以后，婚姻中可能出现新的矛盾。

words.tran_cn: [数]方程式，等式；相等；[化学]反应式

phrases.phrase: equation of the first (或 second 等) order

trans.tran_cn: 等式，方程式，等同看待，平衡，综合体
trans.tran_en: a statement in mathematics that shows that two amounts or totals are equal
